title: Zoltán Nagy (footballer, born 1985)
text: Zoltán Nagy (; born 25 October 1985 in <a href="Debrecen">Debrecen</a>) is a <a href="Hungarian%20people">Hungarian</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> (<a href="Defender%20%28association%20football%29">defender</a>) player who currently plays for <a href="Debreceni%20VSC">Debreceni VSC</a>.
